name: GDD Minigame
description:
Game for the GDD Course at TU Graz 2021

Control the Spaceship with WASD, press SHIFT for Precision Mode.

Press Space to engage the laser.

Wait for the ship to turn bright green after recharging the laser.

Survive as long as you can against an infinite onslaught of diverse enemies.

Have Fun :D

Additional Features:

4) Laser weapon

6) Ship selection

Felix Windisch
